attributes.action: ban the showing of strictly come dancing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Strictly come dancing is driving boyfriends, husbands and sons mad. It takes up too much tv time and is make many of us crazy, driving us all to watch endless repeats of top gear on the iplayer. It been running for far too long!
No more! stop strictly come dancing!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
